entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 11:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 5:27 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or rain mixed with freezing rain beginning early in the morning then changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle later in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:27 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:27 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
